titleStmt.title: Tuesday the fifteenth of March, 1652. An order of Parliament for setting apart Tuesday the twelfth of April next, to be a day of publique thanks-giving
Proceedings. 1653-03-15
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
